movies.title: Mar brava
movies.plot: Mingo, a kid whose father and brother have disappeared in shipwrecks, finds an amnesic man lying on the beach. Might he be St. Elmo?
movies.simplePlot: Mingo, a kid whose father and brother have disappeared in shipwrecks, finds an amnesic man lying on the beach. Might he be St. Elmo?

biography.bio: He entered the theater company of Ernesto Vilches being 18 years old. His debut in cinema was in 1935. During the spanish civil war he was air force liutenant. He did theater and TV.
biography.name: Alfredo Mayo

biography.bio: Jorge Sanz was born on August 26, 1969 in Madrid, Spain as Jorge Sanz Miranda. He is an actor and writer, known for Conan the Barbarian (1982), La fille de tes rêves (1998) and Lovers: A True Story (1991).
biography.name: Jorge Sanz

biography.bio: Alma Muriel was born on October 20, 1951 in Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico. She was an actress, known for Luna de sangre (1984), Amor libre (1979) and Cuando tejen las arañas (1979). She was married to José María Napoleón. She died on January 5, 2014 in Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo, Mexico.
biography.name: Alma Muriel

biography.bio: Guillermo Antón is an actor, known for Extra Terrestrial Visitors (1983), Marquise (1997) and Big game: La chasse aux noirs (1980).
biography.name: Guillermo Antón

biography.bio: Mireia Ros was born in 1956 in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Lidia Sentís. She is an actress and director, known for [REC] 3: Genesis (2012), Los violadores del amanecer (1978) and Alice in Spanish Wonderland (1979).
biography.name: Mireia Ros

biography.bio: José Lifante was born on June 3, 1943 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as José Ruiz Lifante. He is an actor, known for The Adventures of Baron Munchausen (1988), Dagon (2001) and The Living Dead at Manchester Morgue (1974). He has been married to Elisenda Ribas since 1974.
biography.name: José Lifante

biography.bio: Aarón Hernán was born on November 20, 1931 in Camargo, Chihuahua, Mexico. He is an actor, known for De que te quiero, te quiero (2013), La mentira (1998) and Marisol (1996).
biography.name: Aarón Hernán

biography.bio: Eduardo Bea is an actor, known for Bride to Be (1975), Foul Play (1977) and Pascual Duarte (1976).
biography.name: Eduardo Bea

biography.bio: Daniel Martin was born as Antonio Pedro Gargallo Olivares. He was an actor, known for Un solo corazón (1983), Yellow Hair and the Fortress of Gold (1984) and El ángel caído (1985). He died in 1992 in Mexico.
biography.name: Daniel Martin

biography.bio: Francisco Vidal was born as José Francisco Vidal Bornay. He is an actor and assistant director, known for Pan's Labyrinth (2006), Crónicas de un pueblo (1971) and La verdad de Laura (2002).
biography.name: Francisco Vidal

biography.bio: José Febles is an actor, known for Perros callejeros II (1979), Playa azul (1982) and Al sur del edén (1982).
biography.name: José Febles

biography.bio: Mimí Muñoz was born in 1915. She is an actress, known for Mambrú se fue a la guerra (1986), Divertido siglo (1972) and La escopeta nacional (1978).
biography.name: Mimí Muñoz

biography.bio: Ricardo Díaz is an actor, known for El fontanero, su mujer, y otras cosas de meter... (1981), Cut-Throats Nine (1972) and Los pornoaficionados (1982).
biography.name: Ricardo Díaz

biography.bio: Carmen Martínez Sierra was born on May 3, 1904 in Madrid, Comunidad de Madrid, Spain. She was an actress, known for The Telephone Box (1972), Enseñar a un sinvergüenza (1970) and Amore vuol dir gelosia (1975). She died on November 6, 2012 in Madrid.
biography.name: Carmen Martínez Sierra

biography.bio: Alexis is an actor, known for Mar brava (1983).
biography.name: Alexis
